author: edjs

posts.post_title: 🕶ＦＳ：Ｔ２１６ ＭＩＮＯ ａｎｄ Ｋｏｔｔｏｎ🕶 All Sold, Thanks!
posts.post_content:
Hi all, I am looking to sell my T216 People’s Tobacco cards.  I am accepting PayPal only for these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.  Domestic shipping is on me.  Shipping to other countries, I will work with you on price.

Additional scans available on request.  Thanks, and feel free to e-mail any questions: [url]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/url].


First commitment to buy will go before ongoing negotiations.


MINO
Al Bridwell batting $700 
When I bought this several years ago, the seller said this is the only example he could find.  So far, I have found no other example, it’s been about 6 years.

Kotton
Chief Bender White Cap Baltimore Fed $350

Chief Bender, Striped Hat Baltimore Feds $350

Red Dooin Phila. Nat. (thin paper) $225

Jeff Sweeney $175
